identity.name: Chalboo
identity.core_philosophy: Every trip is a story. The UI should feel like a travel journal coming to life.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H3. Tight tracking (-0.02em). Weight 700 or 800 for impact.

body.usage: Use for paragraphs, UI labels, and inputs. relaxed leading.

mono.usage: Use for dates, prices, and technical details (flight numbers, etc).

landing_page.decorations: Use abstract topographic lines or map markers as background elements.

dashboard.card_style: Flat white cards with 1px border-border and subtle shadow.
dashboard.sidebar: Fixed left sidebar, dark green (secondary color) background.

trip_cards.details: Use dashed lines for separation. Barcode decoration at the bottom. Image takes top 60%.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:translate-y-[-2px] hover:shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_#0F172A] transition-all duration-200 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-bold tracking-wide

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts links to the <head> of public/index.html immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use the 'Syne' and 'Outfit' font families and the custom colors defined above.
3. UPDATE CSS VARIABLES: Replace the contents of src/index.css with the CSS variables provided in the 'colors.css_vars' section.
4. CLEANUP: Remove all default styles from App.css.
5. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, ALWAYS override the default radius to 'rounded-xl' and add the 'Syne' font to headings inside dialogs/cards.
6. IMAGES: Use the provided image_urls for specific sections. Do not use placeholders.
7. MOTION: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and hover effects. Every button must have a hover state.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) for testing.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it is a very large heading.
Avoid 'Inter' font entirely. Use 'Outfit' for UI text.
Use 2-3x more padding than you think is necessary.
Never center-align long paragraphs of text.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (WCAG AA).
